free.chess
Interface PiecePainter

All Known Subinterfaces:
ColoredPiecePainter
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultPiecePainter, free.chess.art.EboardVectorPiecePainter, ImagePiecePainter, VectorPiecePainter
public interface PiecePainter

An interface classes that know how to paint chess pieces should implement.

Method Summary
 java.awt.Dimension getPreferredPieceSize()
          Returns the preferred size of the pieces.
 void paintPiece(Piece piece, java.awt.Graphics g, java.awt.Component component, java.awt.Rectangle rect, boolean shaded)
          Paints the given piece at the given coordinates on the given Graphics object scaled to the given size.
 

Method Detail

getPreferredPieceSize

java.awt.Dimension getPreferredPieceSize()
Returns the preferred size of the pieces. Should return a dimension that has no area (width<=0 or height<=0) if this PiecePainter doesn't have a preferred piece size.

paintPiece

void paintPiece(Piece piece,
                java.awt.Graphics g,
                java.awt.Component component,
                java.awt.Rectangle rect,
                boolean shaded)
Paints the given piece at the given coordinates on the given Graphics object scaled to the given size. The component argument may be null. The shaded argument specifies whether the piece should be drawn in a special, shaded manner.
